abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio's administration, as part of next budget, proposes restructuring and additional $2 billion in subsidies for city's struggling public hospital system, Health and Hospitals.
lead_paragraph: The mayor’s next budget includes a restructuring of Health & Hospitals as the system competes for patients in a changing marketplace.

headline.main: De Blasio to Propose $2 Billion for New York City’s Hospital System
headline.print_headline: Mayor’s Budget Will Include $2 Billion  for City’s Struggling Hospital System

snippet: The mayor’s next budget includes a restructuring of Health & Hospitals as the system competes for patients in a changing marketplace.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
